meaningMnemonic: When a person <kanji>die</kanji>s in a <kanji>war</kanji> they're considered to have been <vocabulary>killed in action</vocabulary>. There are lots of memorials around the world for people who died this way.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
